description.value:
Special: Unwieldy

Note: Extremely Rare when sold by Stryxis.D oesn't damage non-living targets, machines (Machine (5+) Trait), or any creature with Daemoinc Trait. But ignores armour and toughness. Don't add Strength Bonus to damage. Is disabled for 1d10 days if hitting a psychic ward, barrier, or untouchable. -10 to Parry.
